column4: I have my system running great.. on Breezy, is it really worth it to Update???
I have my system running great.. on Breezy, is it really worth it to Update???
I feel like I'm lagging behind
better lag behind a week or month or two than waste your time chasing bugs

have you tried it? what are the features?
to make sure a package is stable it needs long time of testing
so most of the time ubuntu is newer debian is stble as a rook
